/users/jcrouse/perforce/drivers/projects/geodelx/linux/glibc/candidates/common/utils/deck.c File Reference

Implements a deck of cards randomizer. More...

#include <unistd.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include "deck.h"

Functions

T_deck * deck_create (size_t size, unsigned int seed, void *data, size_t dsize)
 Allocates an deck of cards and initializes them with ordinal and data.

void deck_destroy (T_deck *d)
 Deletes the deck a all cards in it. Does not delete data referenced by the cards.

void deck_shuffle (T_deck *d)
 shuffles the given T_deck d, and resets dealt field. Does not modify the card ordinal or data fields.

T_deck_card * deck_deal (T_deck *d, int blackjack)
 returns the next card in the deck, advances the dealt field, automatically reshuffling, as needed unless "blackjack" mode is set

T_deck_card * deck_peek (T_deck *d, int blackjack)
 returns the next card in the deck without advancing "dealt". Allows the caller peek at the next card without actually dealing it. This can result in the deck shuffling unless blackjack is set, or NULL if blackjack is set and the deck is out of cards.

Detailed Description

Implements a deck of cards randomizer.
